channel.title: management on PO, Lead product Design at buzzvil
channel.description: Recent content in management on PO, Lead product Design at buzzvil

item.title: Product Manager @buzzvil
item.description: Since 2018 I’ve been leading amazing mission teams. The first mission was about giving the company a strong focus on improving our overall customer experience. This was a cross-disciplinary team and it happened right after our company moved to a matrix organization, adjusting our structure to accommodate the many newcomers and be more scalable. After that mission ended we merged with another mission to regroup and simplify our inventory and I took the lead to ease the transition.
